sample: ive seen ak-47s ive seen sawed off shotguns ive seen all of this ive seen dynamite on the streets

el-p: everythin out here is broken or blemished and battered and tattered but mine you let it burn and decay and created the kings of the cinder divine i am done asking and pleading and begging you recognize i am alive you are done walking inside of the section youre treading in there was a line cement block hard rock it dont stop get it get it your whole blocks soft it comes off like skittish bitches were wolves to the bitter finish not full gotta get it in get it get us dinner violators tryna finish any little sentence we will sentence sinners it all stinks but where we live is where the sets sinkin they say sorry son accept it same old song of the subjectors sorry sirs but we dont sing along to anthems or your pledges in your garbage rose the rulers of the restless do not test us
